Name: Block Collide
About the game: Block collide is a relaxing puzzle game with a minimalistic art style. The game contains 50 different puzzles with varying difficulties and mechanics. The atmospheric soundtrack is composed only for this game. The game can be played both with only the mouse, keyboard, or gamepad. The choice is yours. Every completed level will unlock an achievement. In this puzzle game, you have to click on the cubes to move them to the goals. But you have to beware that they don’t collide with each other. You have to find the right order to move the different cubes so they won’t crash. In later levels new nodes will get introduces like a node that pauses the movement, cubes that move in pairs, and locks that block the way that only passable between turns.
